txt_en: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
txt_cn: 善良的话语或许很简短，很简单，但产生的回响却是无穷止尽。
author: Mother Teresa

txt_en: Today a reader, tomorrow a leader.
txt_cn: 今日读书人，明日领导者。
author: Margaret Fuller

txt_en: Take chances; make mistakes. That's how you grow.
txt_cn: 去冒险，去犯错。你就是这样成长起来的。
author: Mary Tyler Moore

txt_en: Through love comes calm, and through calm comes thought.
txt_cn: 爱使人平静，而平静使人思考。
author: 《三块广告牌》

txt_en: Working hard for something we don't care about is called stress; working hard for something we love is called passion.
txt_cn: 努力做自己不在乎的事叫做压力；努力做自己喜爱的事叫做激情。
author: Simon Sinek

txt_en: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
txt_cn: 智者谈论思想；普通人谈论事情；小人谈论他人。
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

txt_en: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
txt_cn: 让生活变得更好的不是偶然，而是改变。
author: Jim Rohn

txt_en: Sometimes the most scenic roads in life are the detours you didn't mean to take.
txt_cn: 有时候，最美的景色，就是你无意中绕行所至的沿途风景。
author: Angela N. Blount

txt_en: A goal is not always meant to be reached; it often serves simply as something to aim at.
txt_cn: 目标不一定永远都要达到，但可以用来帮助我们瞄准方向。
author: 李小龙

txt_en: The more we do, the more we can do.
txt_cn: 我们做的越多，能做的也就越多。
author: William Hazlitt

txt_en: Life is short. Kiss slowly, laugh insanely, love truly and forgive quickly.
txt_cn: 生命短暂，慢慢去吻，放声去笑，真心去爱，尽快原谅。
author: Paulo Coelho

txt_en: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
txt_cn: 抱着必胜的信念行动。
author: Charles F. Kettering

txt_en: Doubt is a killer. You just have to know who you are and what you stand for.
txt_cn: 怀疑自己的杀伤力很大，你必须了解自己和所坚持的原则。
author: Jennifer Lopez

txt_en: In all of living, have much fun and laughter. Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.
txt_cn: 不管是什么样的生活，都要开心快乐。生活是用来享受的，而不是用来忍受的。
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

txt_en: Death is not the end of life, forgetting is the end of life.
txt_cn: 死亡并不是生命的终点，遗忘才是。
author: 《寻梦环游记》

txt_en: Guard well your thoughts when alone and your words when accompanied.
txt_cn: 独处守住心，群处守住嘴。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice.
txt_cn: 不要让他人意见的杂音淹没了自己的心声。
author: Steve Jobs

txt_en: Keep moving forward, and if it's time to go, it's time.
txt_cn: 保持前进，步履不停，如果是时候该走了，那就顺其自然。
author: Stan Lee

txt_en: Some birds aren't meant to be caged, that's all. Their feathers are just too bright.
txt_cn: 有些鸟儿是关不住的，因为它们的羽翼太耀眼。
author: 《肖申克的救赎》

txt_en: All the trees are losing their leaves, and not one of them is worried.
txt_cn: 每棵树的树叶都在凋零，却没有一棵树为此而忧心忡忡。
author: Donald Miller

txt_en: He who has a "why" to live for can bear almost any "how".
txt_cn: 知生命之意者，可承生命之重。
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

txt_en: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
txt_cn: 不论我们的灵魂是什么做成的，他的和我的是一模一样的。
author: 《呼啸山庄》

txt_en: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
txt_cn: 永远不要低头，保持高昂的姿态，直视这个世界。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: A book should serve as the ax for the frozen sea within us.
txt_cn: 书籍是一把利斧，凿开我们内心冰封的海洋。
author: Franz Kafka

txt_en: You are always there for me when things tend to go wrong.
txt_cn: 每当事情要变得糟糕时，你总在我身旁。
author: 《冰雪奇缘》
